typeMetadata.name: Custom HTML
typeMetadata.description: Allows you to embed any custom HTML, for example JavaScript or CSS Styles.
typeMetadata.help: The Custom HTML tag allows you to embed any tag which is not supported yet. The possibilities with this trigger are pretty much unlimited.

row.name: customHtml
row.title: Custom HTML
row.description: This tag is ideal when you need to add for example custom styles or custom JavaScript or when you are looking for a specific tag which is not yet supported. With this tag you can append any HTML to the bottom of your page, add styles, or execute JavaScript. Note: You can replace content within the HTML with variables by putting a variable name in curly brackets like this {{PageUrl}}.

row.name: htmlPosition
row.title: Position
row.description: Define the position of where the HTML should be inserted into your website.
